encyclopaedia.labels module¶

class encyclopaedia.labels.Labels(encyclopaedia)[source]¶

Bases: renpy.store.object

Controls how the labels that display Encyclopaedia data appear.

percentage_label¶

Placed next to the percentage unlocked number

Type

str

page_label¶

Placed before the entry page displayed

Type

str

page_separator_label¶

Placed in-between the current page number and the total page number

Type

str

sort_number_label¶

Label for Number Sorting

Type

str

sort_alphabetical_label¶

Label for Alphabetical sorting

Type

str

sort_reverse_alphabetical_label¶

Label for Reverse Alphabetical sorting

Type

str

sort_subject_label¶

Label for Subject sorting

Type

str

sort_unread_label¶

Label for Unread sorting

Type

str

unread_entry_label¶

Default for the tag next to unread entries

Type

str

locked_entry_label¶

Default for a “Locked Entry” button

Type

str

property entry_current_page¶

The sub-page of an entry that is being viewed.

Returns

str

property percentage_unlocked¶

Percentage representation of the amount of the encyclopaedia that’s unlocked. ie: ‘50%’.

Returns

str

property sorting_mode¶

Label for the encyclopaedia’s current sorting mode.

Returns

str

Renpy-Encyclopaedia
